value:
Nice place. What I like best is that
there seems to be little need for
those in my line of work.

The Black Fang was formed with a
goal of ridding the world of those who
deserved it...$k$pThings changed, though. I know well
whose fault that was.

On patrol, are you? Don't forget to
take a break every now and again.

I know a great spot to relax. Why
don't you join me?$k$pIt's quite the luxury, not having to
worry about what you're going to
eat or where you're going to sleep.

As a rule, assassins are weaklings...
They can't win if they fight fair, so they
use trickery.$k$pKeep your eyes peeled—that's my
advice.

Sorry for sneaking up on you. Old
habits... I'm just here to say hello for
$Nf.

They don't call me the Hurricane
for nothing.
I still have some skill.
I've lost my touch...

You're hanging your hopes on
me? I'll have to get to work.

Me? I'm just a small-time thief. You
can call me Legault.$k$pI don't know if I'll be able to live up to
your expectations, but I'll do what I
can...within reason.

Hi there, $Nu.$k$pYou did well today. I did...well enough,
I suppose.$k$pYou might guess it by looking at me,
but I don't scare easily. Coming here
did put me on edge, though...$k$pI wondered what bunch of scoundrels
might summon somebody like me to
fight for them.$k$pNow, though... We've been through
it all. I've come to realize you're not
up to no good.$k$pIn fact, you have an aura of downright
goodness. It reminds me of old
times...$k$pKeep to your path, and keep moving
forward. I'd hate to see something
like this fall to pieces again.
ほらよっ
悪いね
うああっ！
参ったね…
You'll be dead soon.
Gotta fight dirty.
How does this make you feel?
Right here.
I guess it's time...
Haha
I'm Legault, former Black Fang. Now I'm just a humble thief.
I’m your new hobby, is that it? You falling for me?
Don't get the wrong idea. As a rule, assassins are weaklings.
I can't win in a fair fight, so I use trickery.
Catch your target unaware. Poison them. Take hostages. That's the way I fight.
Being an assassin's not a job to brag about, but everyone had a kind of pride in what they did.
Why do I stick with you? Well, it's a little thing they call love.
Nice.
Hm?
Who next?
